languages.text: "С тобой говорит Вольный Торговец, владетель{mf||ница} сего судна! Немедленно возьми себя в руки перед избранником святейшего Бога-Императора и покайся в своих преступлениях".

traits.locale_text: "С тобой говорит Вольный Торговец, владетель{mf||ница} сего судна! Немедленно возьми себя в руки перед избранником святейшего Бога-Императора и покайся в своих преступлениях".

languages.text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."
languages.original_text: "С тобой говорит Вольный Торговец, владетель{mf||ница} сего судна! Немедленно возьми себя в руки перед избранником святейшего Бога-Императора и покайся в своих преступлениях".

traits.locale_text: "You are addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to recompose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."
"You are addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to recompose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."
"You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."
"You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."
"You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

languages.text: « Vous êtes devant {mf|le libre-marchand, seul maître|la libre-marchande, seule maîtresse} à bord de ce vaisseau ! {mf|L'élu|L'élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu vous ordonne de vous reprendre et d'implorer son pardon pour vos crimes. »
languages.original_text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes devant {mf|le libre-marchand, seul maître|la libre-marchande, seule maîtresse} à bord de ce vaisseau ! {mf|L'élu|L'élue} de l'Empereur-Dieu vous ordonne de vous reprendre et d'implorer son pardon pour vos crimes. »

languages.text: 「お前は自由開拓者と呼ばれている。そしてこの船の主でもあるのだ！神帝陛下のチョーズンの御前で罪を認め、許しを請え」
languages.original_text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は自由開拓者と呼ばれている。そしてこの船の主でもあるのだ！神帝陛下のチョーズンの御前で罪を認め、許しを請え」

languages.text: “这艘船的船长，行商浪人本人，正在和你讲话！我命令你，立刻在神皇的神选者面前恢复理智，请求我宽恕你的罪行。”
languages.original_text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

traits.locale_text: “这艘船的船长，行商浪人本人，正在和你讲话！我命令你，立刻在神皇的神选者面前恢复理智，请求我宽恕你的罪行。”

languages.text: "Ihr werdet {mf|vom Freihändler und Meister|von der Freihändlerin und Meisterin} dieses Schiffs angesprochen! Ich befehle Euch, Euch vor {mf|dem|der} Auserwählten des Gottimperators zusammenzureißen und um Vergebung für Eure Verbrechen zu flehen."
languages.original_text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet {mf|vom Freihändler und Meister|von der Freihändlerin und Meisterin} dieses Schiffs angesprochen! Ich befehle Euch, Euch vor {mf|dem|der} Auserwählten des Gottimperators zusammenzureißen und um Vergebung für Eure Verbrechen zu flehen."

languages.text: «¡Te habla {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y {mf|señor|señora} de este navío! Te ordeno que recobres la compostura ante {mf|el elegido|la elegida} del Dios Emperador y supliques el perdón por tus crímenes».
languages.original_text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

traits.locale_text: «¡Te habla {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y {mf|señor|señora} de este navío! Te ordeno que recobres la compostura ante {mf|el elegido|la elegida} del Dios Emperador y supliques el perdón por tus crímenes».

languages.text: "Bu geminin efendisi olan Hür Tacir konuşuyor! Sana Tanrı İmparator'un seçilmişi karşısında kendini toplamanı ve suçlarının affı için yalvarmanı emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are being addressed by the Rogue Trader and master of this vessel! I command you to compose yourself before the God-Emperor's chosen and beg forgiveness for your crimes."

traits.locale_text: "Bu geminin efendisi Hür Tacir seninle konuşuyor! Sana Tanrı İmparator'un seçilmişinin karşısında kendini toplamanı ve suçlarının affedilmesi için yalvarmanı emrediyorum."
